verses.content: “Tangkaruo ta ding chun cho- suokna hmun chu a um ngei a nih, Rângkachak ta dinga sukthiengna hmun leh.
Thîr chu leihnuoia inthawka lâk suok a na, Dârsen ruok chu lunga inthawka emtuia lâk suok a nih.
Mihriemin inthimna a suktâwp a, Thina hlim le inthimna lung sâmuphai chu, A hmun hlatakahai chun a zawng suok hlak.
A ram hluotuhai um nawnaa chun khur an cho a, A chunga fehai chun an theinghil a; Mi hlatnaah an inkhai a, an inthên an inthên a.
Hnuoi ruok chu amaa inthawk chun bei a hung suok a, A hnuoitieng chu, inlet chun chu mei ang el a nih.
Chutaka lunghai chu Sapphir lung hmun dâm a na, Rângkachak hlawmhai chu a um a nih.
Chu lampui chu chunglêng vate sa fami chun a hriet nawh a, Mulukawlhai mit khawm chun a hmu ngai nawh.
Ramsa chapotakhai khawm chun an sir ngai nawh a, Sakeibaknei ṭiumtak khawm chun a hraw ngai nawh.
“A kut chu lungpui changtak chunga chun a sie suok a, Tlânghai chu a bula inthawkin a kei let a.
Lungpuihai lai chun tuiluongnahai a cho a, A mithai chun thil hlutak chu a hmuh a.
An far nawna dingin tuihnârhai chu a ting a, Thil inthupa um chu varah a hung lâk suok tah a.
Amiruokchu, khâwlai am varna chu hmu nîng a ta? Hrietthiemna hmun khawm chu khâwlai am a na?
Mihriem chun chu man chu an hriet nawh a, Mi hring rama khawm chu chu hmu suok a ni bawk nawh.
Khursûng chun, ‘Keimaah a um nawh,’ a ta, Tuisuoriet chun, ‘Keimaah a um nawh,’ a ti bawk a.
Rângkachaka nei thei a ni nawh a, Chu chu man ding chun tangkaruo khawm bûk thei a ni bawk nawh.
Ophir rângkachak le chun ngaihlut inang thei a ni nawh a, Sapphir amanih, Berul lung hlutak le khawm chun hlut inanga ngai thei a ni nawh.
Rângkachak le hlimen chun an tluk thei nawh a, Chu chu thlengpui ding chu rângkachak inthiengtaka thleng thei khawm a ni bawk nawh.
Tuikeplung amanih, lunghlu khawm chu a hrila hril ding a ni nawh a, Anih, Varna man chu lunghlu chun tluk naw nih a,
Ethiopia rama Topaz lunghlu chun tluk naw nih a, Rângkachak inthieng le khawm chun a hlut angkhata ngai ding a ni nawh.
Anleh, varna chu khâwtaka inthawka hung am a na? Hrietthiemna hmun chu khâwlai am ni tâng a ta?
Mi hring po po mithmuhaia inthawka thupa umin, Chunga vatehai kâwla khawm thup a nih.
Bohmangna le Thina chun, ‘Chu chu thuthang chu kan nahaiin kan lo hriet a,’ an ta.
“Pathien chun chu lampui chu a hriet a, Chu chu hmun khawm chu a hriet a nih.
Ama chun kâwlkawdawnghai chu a hmuh a, Vân khuphnuoi po po hi a hmu vawng a nih.
Thli hrâtnahai chu a pêk lai khan, Anih, tuihai chu inkhinain ân khi suok a nih.
Chu lai chun ruo ta ding chun bi a ruotpêkin, Vâninrûm, kâwlinlep ta ding khawma lampui a siempêk bawk a.
Chun, ama chun a hmuh a, a puong tah a, A tungding a, anih, a zawng suok bawk a.
Chun, mihriem kuoma chun, ‘Ngai ta, Lalpa ṭi chu, varna a nih; Suola inthawka fe hmang chu hrietthiemna a ni bawk a,’ a ta,” tiin
